raw_snippet: 226 The Big Boss A.T.V. A popular all terrain vehicle with good speed and good fuel milage. Vehicle Type: ATV Dune Buggy Type Crew: One pilot and can accommodate three passengers comforta- bly. Maximum Speed: 150 mph (240 km) Engine: Combustion or electric engine. Maximum Range: 300 miles (480 km) Length: 16 feet (4.8 m) Weight: One ton M.D.C. by Location: Tires (4) - 5 each Main Body - 65
